titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

1934 VAN DEN BERG
Miss Tamara 9 Ave Frederic Le Play
1 m 2 vols 20 dep ref. 60 80 paid 40 April 20 due 40 paid March 19
March 16 Apologie for Poetrie April 13 Passage to India March 19 March 19 Undertones of War April 13 April 13 King Leon Verity ed. April 20 White Monkey April 20
Hôtel Royal Bertollini à Courmayeur Vallée d'Aosta
Renewed 2 July - 16 2 vols ------ 12f dep 30f 2 July - Ann Vickers B.B. x Memoirs of a fox hunting man. 12 July
Renewed 8 vols -- to 1Sept. 1934 24f dep. 135f 135f 1. Eng: Men of Letters: Mackeray 144f 2. Wordsworth 3. Goldsmith 7. Apologie for Poetrie July 12 4. Dryden 8. Vanity Fair 5. Vicar of Wakefield 9. Bridges poems 6. Prelude. (over)
July 12 Hazlitt: Elizabethan Lit Sept 6 & Characters of Shakespeare Life of Shakespeare, Lee Sept 6 Green's History of Eng Card Sept 13 Sept 13 Vanity Fair Oct 6 Thackeray, Trolloppe Oct 6 16
1935 Van den Bergh
Tamara 72 ave de LaBourdonnais
2v. 1 m 2 vols dep. 60f 25
5 Sept. Shakespeare (J.Q. Adams) Sept 17 . Sun also rises (0.50) Sept 17 Sept 17 Bunyan (Eng Men of Let) Sept 25 Sept 17 Hazlitt's Age of Elizabeth Sept 25 25 Pope (Eng. Men of Letters) Oct 1 Heavens my Destination 0.50 Oct 1 Oct 1 Shelley (Eng. Men of Letters) 24 Complete Poetical Works of Shelley 24 Dec. Renewed 5 Oct - 5 January 1936 60 24 Dec Diaghileff (for 2 vols) Jan 3 Jan 3 ABC guide to Music Feb. 5. holly 91 rue Ollivier de Serres, XVe Jan 7 at 6 OctocII Sent P.c Feb 6 April Renewed Jan. 3 - May 3. 1936. 40f
Feb. 5 Introduction to Dutch, art. April 22 April 22 Thackeray a consideration, Saintsbury May 5. Renewed April 3 - July 3 1936 40v May 5 Pope ed:by John Morley (2.25pd.) 29
1935 BLACKNER Alan
Hôtel Malherbe refunded 3 Sept. Alan R. Blackner 1 v. by day dep. 30f
30 Aug. White Peacock 1f a day. 31 31 - Culture + environment 2 New Signal 2 2 - L.C. 3 2. New Voices 3
VAN DEN BERGH 12 July cont: Vanity Fair Sept 6 Bridge's Poems Sept 6 Life of Shakespeare. Lee Sept 6 Hist. of England, Greene BB Hazlett. Elizabethan Lit + characters of Shakespeare Renewed Sept 6st - Dec 6st 1934 2 vols 50v dep. 60 (paid 9f fines for 6 vols overdue) Mrs Dalloway Nov 23 Nov 23 Babbitt Dec 11 26 - paid for Sidney's Apology for Poetry 8v took out Thackeray (Eng men of Letters) Dec 11 Renewed Dec 6 - March 6 1935 40v (will pay next time) Dec 11 Zuleika Dobson Jan 7 Jan 7 Essay on Bacon, Whyte 16 Francis Bacon, Stuart 0.50 Jan 9 Bacon's Essays, Reynolds .50 16 16 Mrs. Dalloway 29 Jan 23 Macaulay on Bacon, extra 5 Feb 29 Jan. At 33 0.50 6f 12 - 5 Feb. Bunyan (E.M.L.) -> owes April 18 Renewed March 6 - June 6 1935 (owes) pd 42 - April 18 Point Counterpoint 12 June
1933 VAN DEN BERGH Van den Bergh Tamara 9 Ave Frédéric Le Play 72 Ave La Bourdonnais refunded T. van den Bergh 1 m 1 v 12 dep 30 10/- 8 108 staying only 2 W/B can have 2 vols at a time Dec 12 Room of Ones Own Dec 15 Short History of Eng Lit, Saintsbury Dec 19 15 David Copperfield Fifteen Plays of Shakespeare Dec 19 Shakespearean Tragedy, Bradley Dec 19 no extra charge Dec 19 Wordsworth's Poetical Works Jan 3 Esther Waters Jan 3 Jan 3 David Copperfield " 8 Vicar of Wakefield " 8
